projects.name: Portfolio Site
projects.description: My personal portfolio site you are browsing right now. Built with Nextjs and TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Football Stadium
projects.description: List of Football Stadiums. Built with MERN stack. You can add, edit and delete stadiums once you are authenticated and authorized. You can also add reviews for stadiums.

projects.name: Course App Angular
projects.description: Developed a Courses App Application using Angular NodeJS, Express and MongoDB(MEAN). It shows list of all programming courses and youtube player to view them. You can add, edit and delete courses once you are authenticated and authorized

projects.name: Course App
projects.description: List of all the programming courses and a youtube player to view them. Built with react, bootstrap,node, mongodb ,node and redux
